import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import logo from '../static/icons/Logo.svg' import '../static/css/base.css' export const VerifyPage = () =>{ const [code, setCode]=useState('') const ChangeHandler = event =>{ setCode(event.target.value) } return(

Verify your telegram


Please click the link or scan QR-code and request code from the telegram bot

t.me/AAA_System_Bot



) }
